v2.0.0

Info

Since 2019, I’ve been passionate about web development, working on both client-side and server-side projects. Along this journey, I’ve collaborated on projects in Spanish, French, and English environments, which helped me adapt quickly and communicate effectively across multicultural teams. Over time, I found myself more drawn to the backend, where I enjoy designing and building scalable, reliable systems.

I hold a Master's degree in Development of Applications and Web Services from the University of Alicante. My focus is on designing and developing robust software solutions with .NET technologies. I’m deeply interested in software engineering architectures, problem solving, and building scalable, reliable applications. While my main expertise is centered on .NET, I also explore modern front-end frameworks such as Angular to complement and enhance full-stack development when needed.

I’m currently working with microservices architecture, building scalable and reliable distributed systems. I’m also learning cloud computing with Azure and exploring the potential of artificial intelligence.

Outside of coding, I enjoy discovering new technologies, reading about web development trends, and diving into a good book. I’m also passionate about running and playing football, which keep me active and balanced.

Labs

    000 Micromerce - Website
    Video Demo | Source Code
    A modern and responsive landing page for Micromerce, designed to effectively showcase products and drive user engagement. Pug • SCSS • Webpack • Babel
    001 Laplace - Website
    Video Demo | Source Code
    Enabling users to explore various locations through immersive high-resolution 360° VR experiences. Webpack • Babel • SCSS • Gulp
    002 Eltajine - Website
    Video Demo | Source Code
    A beautifully designed website for a Moroccan restaurant, showcasing the rich culinary heritage and unique dining experience. SCSS • Gulp • Terser
    003 Miratti - Desktop App
    Video Demo | Source Code
    Point of Sale (POS) and inventory management system designed for Miratti Bags, streamlining sales and inventory tracking. .NET Framework • WPF • Entity Framework • PDFsharp
    004 TPVNube - Web App | Mobile App
    Video Demo | Source Code: Mobile App | Web App | API
    Cloud-based Point of Sale (POS) system designed to streamline sales and inventory management. The app leverages Angular/Ionic for a responsive and adaptive user interface, with .NET Web API ensuring robust backend operations. Deployed on Azure for high scalability and global accessibility. .Angular • Ionic • .NET Web API • Azure
    005 SaveTabs - Extension (In Progress)
    Video Demo | Source Code
    Enhances developer productivity in Visual Studio by allowing users to save and switch between sets of open files (tabs) for specific tasks. .NET Framework • C# • XAML
